description: Ground truth extraction data for Credit Suisse / Fifth Third Auto Trust 2008-1 CSA

agreement_info.agreement_title: CREDIT SUPPORT ANNEX to the Schedule to the ISDA MASTER AGREEMENT

valuation_timing.valuation_time: close of business on the Local Business Day before the Valuation Date

eligible_collateral_table.collateral_type: Cash: US Dollars in depository account form
U.S. Treasury Securities: negotiable debt obligations issued by the U.S. Treasury Department having a remaining maturity of up to and not more than 1 year
Treasuries having a remaining maturity of greater than 1 year but not more than 10 years
Treasuries having a remaining maturity of greater than 10 years

notes: This is a simplified version focusing on core extractable fields
Threshold has complex conditional logic - simplified to base value 'Infinity'
Collateral table has 4 rating event columns with different valuation percentages
Signature blocks omitted as they vary by execution
